Issue.creator: rpjday
Issue.summary: Why do byfn.sh and eyfn.sh set OS_ARCH, then never use it?
Issue.description: I notice that both scripts byfn.sh and eyfn.sh assign a normalized value to the variable OS_ARCH, but neither of them ever ends up using it. In fact, those appear to be the only two references to that particular variable in the entire fabric-samples checkout. Thoughts?
